aboutUs.title: Meet our team
aboutUs.description: At MDK Studio, our team of developers is at the heart of what we do. We are dedicated and passionate about creating innovative solutions that turn ideas into reality.

questions.question: How much does it cost to build a website?
questions.answer: The cost depends on several factors, including the project's complexity, number of pages, and specific features required. We offer personalized quotes based on your needs and requirements.

questions.question: How can I update my website content after it's finished?
questions.answer: We provide basic training so you can manage and modify texts, images, and other site elements. If you prefer, we can also handle updates for you as needed.

questions.question: Can MDK Studio help me choose a domain name?
questions.answer: Yes, we can help you choose a domain name. We consider factors such as relevance to your business, ease of memorization, and availability. We offer guidance and suggestions to find a name that fits your brand identity and is available for registration.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete my website?
questions.answer: The timeline may vary depending on the project's complexity, but generally, a simple website takes 2 to 3 weeks to develop. More complex projects, such as web applications or advanced functionality, may take longer.

questions.question: Does MDK Studio offer technical support after the website is launched?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer technical support after the website is launched. This includes bug fixes, security updates, necessary adjustments, and guidance on managing content. We're here to ensure your website continues to run smoothly and meets your needs.

questions.question: Does MDK Studio provide hosting services?
questions.answer: We offer recommendations for hosting services and can help set up the hosting environment, but we do not provide hosting services directly.

questions.question: How can I get in touch to request a quote or consultation?
questions.answer: You can contact us through the form on our website, via email, or by phone. We're available to discuss your needs and provide a personalized quote.
